word_mean: 靛蓝：从数种豆科植物及其他植物如槐蓝(Indigofera tinctoria)等提取的一种蓝色染料物质，为尿蓝母的配基
亦可人工合成。靛蓝有时可在汗液和尿中发现，来源于尿中的尿蓝母

sentence.Network_cn: 她的前额纹着靛青色的刺青。

sentence.Network_en: The sky was indigo blue, and a great many stars were shining.
sentence.Network_cn: 天空一片深蓝, 闪烁着点点繁星.

sentence.Network_en: He slipped into an indigo tank.

收藏查看周语周语，青年作家，安徽散文家协会理事、中国散文家协会会员。陕西师范大学出版社《靛蓝小孩》（indigo children）书系的主编。关注现代创意写作（creative writing）研究，主编有“禅”系列心灵读本（龙门.
来自中国地区靛蓝儿童(Indigo Children)对宇宙现状、人类历史及命运以及自身任务的描述。文字均来源于靛蓝小孩联邦—星际的科学 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Portuguese índigo, via Latin from Greek indikon, from indikos 'Indian (dye') (see Indic)

entry.def: Something that is indigo is dark purplish blue in colour.

example.tran: 她的前额纹着靛青色的刺青。

means.word_mean: 1. a blue dye obtained from plants or made synthetically
2. deciduous subshrub of southeastern Asia having pinnate leaves and clusters of red or purple flowers; a source of indigo dye
